publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4159 Jamie Hepburn: Royal Mail Profits Double—That the Parliament welcomes a two-fold increase in the annual profits of the Royal Mail, from £162 million in 2007 to £321 million in 2008, with all four core businesses having turned a profit for the first time in two decades; notes that these profits come in spite of the recession and a 5.5% decrease in the number of letters being sent, while private mail companies, including TNT, have experienced huge profit reductions, and believes that these figures present a clear signal that the UK Government must immediately abandon its plans for the part-privatisation of the Royal Mail.

S3M-4159 Royal Mail Profits Double (lodged on 15 May 2009) Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*, Sandra White*, Ian McKee*, Brian Adam*
S3M-4159 Royal Mail Profits Double (lodged on 15 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4159 Royal Mail Profits Double (lodged on 15 May 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*
